Reviews.Title: Bad Product
Reviews.Author: George Trent
Reviews.Content: The connectors are lousy they are very loose which I tried to correct by taping connections but still had problems maintaining contact.I finally replace them.

Reviews.Title: nice  product
Reviews.Author: Linduh
Reviews.Content: i bought this cable  pack o 8 because i needed to run a long lenght up back yard under ground..  so far worked and great  package and shipping from this seller was way to fast and in great shape.. i buy more stuff from this place.. thanks and keep up graet sales  steve
